nodes.text: V2 was an XQ5 platform which, along with its sister platform V1, was part of the initial research facility for the Vorknkx project. They were designed to defend the Vorknkx Project Base.

These facilities were heavily damaged in an assault by Grand Admiral Demetrius Zaarin's rogue forces, and were forced to evacuate. Maarek Stele and his Missile Boat were among loyal Imperial forces responsible for providing cover for the evacuation.
